abstract.t: Following a review of the IETF meeting venue requirements, this document proposes updates to RFC 8718 “IETF Plenary Meeting Venue Selection Process”, clarifies how the IETF Administration Support Activity (IASA) should interpret some elements of RFC 8718, and proposes a replacement exploratory meeting process, thereby updating RFC 8719 "High-Level Guidance for the Meeting Policy of the IETF".
